IT3 Consultants is a consultancy company specialized in the field of Unix (including Linux), disaster recovery, Open Source Projects, Internet and Intranet services.

The name IT3 Consultants was chosen to indicate the 3 Information Technology domains:

  • Information Technology
  • Interface Technology, and
  • Integration Technology

Our Mission

Our mission is to be the glue between the three IT domains.
Where others stop, we start

More information on the Company and services we provide you will find under the Company page.

Open Source

We are involved in several Open Source projects, such as Relax and Recover (rear), Config 2 HTML and many more.

We use GIT for version control in all of our projects to ensure that it is easily to collaborate with other developers, experiment with features and control changes. To see all the projects we contribute on have a look on our GitHub page of Gratien D'haese

Blog

The goal of this blog is to share some of that experience with others, and hopefully have some of you share some experience with us. The blog will contain not only stories, but also frequently asked questions on topics around Unix, Linux, and other tips and tricks.

Engineering at IT3 Consultants

IT3 Consultants was funded in 1996 and is a Belgian IT consultancy company.
